name: DJ Hero 2
description:
OVER 80 ORIGINAL MIXES
The follow up to the award-winning, #1 new videogame IP of 2009, DJ Hero 2 will transform living rooms into nightclubs all over again with an entirely new experience. DJ Hero 2 delivers the new standard in music & rhythm gaming with a host of new DJ and vocal multiplayer modes for friends & families to become mix masters and singing sensations.

THE BEST SOUNDTRACK JUST GOT BETTER
Experience hit music like you’ve never heard it before. DJ Hero 2 offers 80+ mixes featuring the biggest dance, pop, and hip-hop hits from all the top artists including Lady Gaga, deadmau5, Kanye West, Chemical Brothers, Dr. Dre, Rihanna, and more.

DON’T STOP THE PARTY
Party Play mode turns DJ Hero 2 into the ultimate party accessory. Let the games incredible mixes play themselves or jump-in/jump-out to take control and play along without ever stopping the music.

BATTLE YOUR FRIENDS
All-new multiplayer modes redefine the DJ Hero experience. Innovative DJ Battles feature custom mixes and authentic back-and-forth DJ gameplay. New multiplayer modes including Accumulator, Checkpoints, and Streaker let you prove who is the best DJ in the house.

CONTROL THE MUSIC
All new freestyle sections put the mix in your hands. Scratch, sample, and crossfade however you want to make the music your own. Never play a mix the same way twice.

CREATE AN EMPIRE
First ever DJ career mode sends players on a journey around the world, building their careers along the way. Unlock hidden rewards, venues, and celebrity DJs including David Guetta, deadmau5, DJ QBert, RZA, and Tiësto.
